data.title: Red God (Book Seven)
data.meta_description: Red God will be the seventh book in the Red Rising Saga and conclusion to the series. data.text:
Red God will be the seventh book in the Red Rising Saga and conclusion to the series. The book was announced by Pierce Brown during San Diego Comic-Con on July 22, 2022.[1]

The exact date of release has not been confirmed yet, however, in an instagram post, Pierce Brown said Red God would come "soon after" Light Bringer, the latest book.[2] Despite the cover and description being unannounced, a basic synopsis can be guessed at based on Light Bringer. [3]
